dmca.title: DMCA Follow-ups; electronicebuys.com; everything4electronics.com; bigdealtv.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Raul Torres [mailto:raul@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2006 10:20 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Follow-ups; electronicebuys.com; everything4electronics.com;
bigdealtv.com



 

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please find attached a copy of the Terry N. Silverman Digital Millennium
Copyright Act Notification made out to the ISP, ThePlanet.com Internet
Services, regarding your client, electronicebuys.com;
everything4electronics.com; bigdealtv.com. We have enforced the website and
found it to be illegally hosting Sony Home Video and Sony Home Audio
intellectual property. A DMCA notice was also sent to the infringer.

 

Per DMCA policy, if the infringer refuses to comply within the period we
have provided, as the ISP you are required to enforce this policy and either
disable the material or shutdown the website. Please let me know if any
issues arise therein. You may contact me via email at raul@netenforcers.com.

 

Feel free to ask any questions regarding this case.

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

 

Sincerely, 

Raul Torres

LMS Associate

Net Enforcers, Inc.

raul@netenforcers.com

compliance.management@netenforcers.com

The Online Enforcement Experts...... 
Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and
are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally
privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of
delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission
in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is
strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please
immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and
its attachments, if any. Thank you.
